segments.text: Hi , I ’ m Ray , your tenant in Room 209 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There ’ re some problems in my apartment . First , the faucet in the bathtub drips constantly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I ’ ll ask my plumber to come by and fix it today . What else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of the burners on the stove doesn ’ t work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the matter with it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t control the temperature .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll get an electrician to repair it as soon as possible . Is that everything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there ’ s one more thing . The telephone is dead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . There ’ s nothing I can do about that . You ’ Ve got to call the phone company .
segments.speaker: S2
